01: __A person cooking is a person giving: Even the simplest food is a gift.__
02: __When a man's stomach is full it makes no difference whether he is rich or poor.__
03: __Anything is good if it's made of chocolate.__
04: __Leftovers keeps you inspired to think out of the box.__
05: __There are only so many flavors - it's how you combine them that sets you apart.__
06: __Even if you're not a great chef, there's nothing to stop you understanding the difference between what tastes good and what doesn't.__
07: __You don't need a silver fork to eat good food.__
08: __Let's face it, a nice creamy chocolate cake does a lot for a lot of people; it does for me.__
09: __Whether it was our mom's homemade lasagna or a memorable chocolate birthday cake, food has a way of transporting us back to the past.__
10: __The best comfort food will always be greens, cornbread, and fried chicken.__
11: __Good food is a global thing and I find that there is always something new and amazing to learn - I love it!__
12: __Food is our common ground, a universal experience.__
14: __If your mother cooks Italian food, why should you go to a restaurant?__
15: __Baking cookies is comforting, and cookies are the sweetest little bit of comfort food. They are very bite-sized and personal.__
16: __Healthy food may be good for the conscience but Oreos taste a hell of a lot better.__
17: __Once you get a spice in your home, you have it forever. Women never throw out spices. The Egyptians were buried with their spices. I know which one I'm taking with me when I go.__
18: __why put an egg on it when you can rub some bacon on it?__
